title: How to Reach Norton Customer Service by Phone, Chat, & Social Media

steps.title: Call Member Services at 1-800-543-3562.
steps.content: Call Member Services at 1-800-543-3562. Norton has different departments for different issues and topics, but this is their general customer service number for the United States. Since this is the general phone number, you may be on hold for a few minutes. But in a pinch, this is a good way to get a hold of Norton. [1] X Research source For queries specific to Norton LifeLock software , call 1-800-416-0599. Norton’s customer service number is available 24/7. The least busy hours to call are usually between 7 am to 12 pm and after 8 pm (EST). The best days to call are Tuesday, Wednesday, and Friday. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Fill out a customer support form to get a department-specific number.
steps.content: Fill out a customer support form to get a department-specific number. Click the category that most closely reflects the problem you’re having. If the solution you need isn’t there, click “Get Help” and sign into your account or continue as a guest. Scroll down to “Phone support” and click “View Phone Number.” Then, fill out the form with your name, email, phone number, and an explanation of your issue. The website will generate a support ticket and give you the specific phone number you need. [3] X Research source Any number generated by the online form should also be available 24/7 This is probably the fastest way to get a hold of someone who can help you. If you call Norton’s general customer support line, they might redirect you anyway.

steps.title: Fill out a customer support form to chat with a customer service agent.
steps.content: Fill out a customer support form to chat with a customer service agent. Click the category that matches the type of problem that you’re having and hit the yellow “Get help” button. Then, log in to your account or continue as a guest. Find “Chat support” on the page and click “Chat now.” Enter your information and click “Next.” You’ll see a case number pop up on the screen for your issue. Simply select “Chat Now” to begin the live chat. [4] X Research source Like their customer support phone number, Norton’s live chat service is available 24/7.

steps.title: Start a chat with a virtual service agent on Norton’s homepage.
steps.content: Start a chat with a virtual service agent on Norton’s homepage . Look for a yellow chat bubble icon at the bottom right corner of the page. Then, click the icon and select the category that reflects the issue you’re having. Then, provide more details in the chat box when you’re prompted to. The virtual assistant will provide you with information or links relevant to your issue. If they can’t help you, they’ll put you in contact with a live agent.

steps.title: Message Norton directly on X/Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram.
steps.content: Message Norton directly on X/Twitter , Facebook , or Instagram . Norton also provides customer service help through their official social media handles. Simply send one of Norton’s accounts a direct message that details the problem you’re facing. Alternatively, publicly tweet at Norton or comment under their posts about your issue. Companies often fix customer issues a little faster when everyone can see how they respond. Norton’s official social media accounts are : X/Twitter: @NortonSupport Facebook: @Norton Instagram: @nortonsecurity

steps.title: Ask a question on Norton’s forum for quick answers to tough questions.
steps.content: Ask a question on Norton’s forum for quick answers to tough questions. Norton has a community forum where users can post questions and get answers from other users and Norton employees. Simply navigate to the Community page and click “Ask the community.” Log in using your credentials. Then, choose the forum where you want to submit a detailed post describing your question or issue in a new thread. A community member or Norton employee will respond to your post in a day or so. Search existing forum posts to see if anyone else has had your problem! There may be a solution somewhere in the responses.

steps.title: Fill out a privacy request using Norton’s online form.
steps.content: Fill out a privacy request using Norton’s online form . Norton has a specific online request form for questions and concerns related to how they collect and use your information. Simply select your reason for submitting the request and enter your name and email. A customer service agent will reach out to you in the next few days.

steps.title: Norton accepts mail sent to their Member Services department.
steps.content: Norton accepts mail sent to their Member Services department. If you need to send Norton documents or want to reach them via regular mail, address your mail to: [5] X Research source Attn.: Member Services 60 East Rio Salado Parkway, Suite 1000 Tempe, AZ 85281
